title: With portrait mode photos, depth map information isn't recognized by other websites and apps.
content:
I'm using "portrait mode" on my Pixel 3. When I try to upload my photos to Facebook using the "3D option", Facebook doesn't recognize the photo. On further investigation, other sites claim there is no depth map data.
This whole thing is strange because when I first got the phone, I was able to upload my "portrait mode" photos to facebook as 3D images. Now suddenly I can't.
